email.title: Postgrad mixer!
email.text:
Hi everyone!
Tomorrow (Thursday 3rd) DoCSoc will be hosting a postgraduate student mixer in Huxley 311, 6pm-8pm. This mixer is the perfect opportunity to meet your fellow students, and begin this exciting new chapter over board games, laughter and delicious food! We hope to see lots of people there!
Please sign up here: https://buytickets.at/docsoc/1413987/r/outlook
